Jan:

> I spent most of my non-working hours and even some of the working hours
> during the last year on this topic. 

I knew I wasn't alone in this thinking!

> IMHO, Atom/APP can be for the Enterprise Space (large scale, machine-2-machine
> oriented systems) what HTML is for the human oriented Web. With HTTP alone,
> the design space is too unconstrained for an average developer/designer to get
> real work done but with the introduction of Atom/APP (and a core set of
> extensions) design becomes manageable for them.

Are there any references, documents, discussion, examples of such usage 
and/or extensions that you can point me at?

> Yes, definitely - there seems to be a bright future for that marriage.

Super!

Andrzej Jan Taramina
Chaeron Corporation: Enterprise System Solutions
http://www.chaeron.com
